openGraph.ogTitle: Secret Santa Generator, Gift Exchange, Pair Randomizer
openGraph.description: Generate Secret Santa pairs with exclusions, themes, and budget hints for any group.

title: Secret Santa Generator
description: Create random gift exchange pairs with exclusions, themes, and budget hints.

helpers.participants: Enter one name per line. Duplicates are removed automatically.
helpers.exclusions: Use A -> B to block a specific pairing. Multiple lines supported.
helpers.themes: Themes are assigned in order (and looped) after shuffling.
helpers.budget: Fill both fields to show the budget range with the results.
helpers.results: Copy pairs or personal messages to share privately.
helpers.reveal: Pick a participant to reveal only their recipient.

result.empty: No pairs yet. Add participants and generate.
result.revealEmpty: Select a participant to reveal their recipient.

errors.notEnough: Please add at least two participants.
errors.budgetRange: Minimum budget should be less than or equal to maximum.
errors.noSolution: Couldn't find a valid pairing with the current exclusions. Try removing some constraints.

tips.first: Share only the personal message to keep the exchange secret.
tips.second: If pairings fail, reduce or adjust exclusions.
tips.third: Use themes to make the exchange more creative.
